game.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, HDR 사용 가능, 가족 공유, Steam 타임라인
game.shortDescription: The future of an entire continent is at stake in this milestone entry in the Trails series! Explore the vast Calvard Republic with three different protagonists, nurture connections, and master powerful skills in both real-time and turn-based battles as you uncover the secrets at the core of Zemuria!
